index.name: html
index.subtitle: HTML
index.about: HTML is the language that describes the structure and the semantic content of a web document. Content within a web page is tagged with HTML elements and these elements form the building blocks of a website.
index.description: Watch screencasts over a list with the best free videos about HTML and HTML5.

videos.title: What is HTML5?
videos.description: The 1st video in our HTML5 Tutorial series. This video contains no actual coding, but does give you a view into what we will be covering in this series.

videos.title: Starting your first HTML5 site
videos.description: The 2nd video in our HTML5 Tutorial series. Here, I show you how to convert an HTML4.01 site into HTML5. The conversion is unimportant, what's key here is what tags you need to start your HTML5 site.

videos.title: Site Structure - Header, Section, Aside, and Footer
videos.description: The 3rd video in our HTML5 Tutorial series. Here, I show you how to use the new Header, Section, Aside and Footer elements to more semantically structure your site.

videos.title: HTML5 Shiv
videos.description: The 4th video in our HTML5 Tutorial series. Here, I show you how to use the HTML5 Shiv to make sure you code is compatible with older browsers.

videos.title: HTML5 Boilerplate
videos.description: The 5th video in our HTML5 Tutorial series. Here, I show you how to use HTML5 Boilerplate to start your new projects.

videos.title: Page Structure - Coding a blog
videos.description: The 6th video in our HTML5 Tutorial series. Here, I show you how to build the semantic structure of a blog.

videos.title: The Time Element
videos.description: The 7th video in our HTML5 Tutorial series. Here, I show you how to use the time element.

videos.title: Figure and Figcaption
videos.description: The 8th video in our HTML5 Tutorial series. Here, I show you how to use figure and figcaption to have essential content with captions.

videos.title: Form Input Types
videos.description: The 9th video in our HTML5 Tutorial series. Here, I show you some of the new form input types!

videos.title: Form Input Types - Part 2
videos.description: The 10th video in our HTML5 Tutorial series. Here, I show you even more form input types.

videos.title: Form Attributes
videos.description: The 11th video in our HTML5 Tutorial series. Here, I show you the new form attributes in HTML5.

videos.title: Video Part 1
videos.description: The 12th video in our HTML5 Tutorial series. Here, I show you the basics of getting video up and running on your website. This is a barebones usage of HTML5 Video.

videos.title: Video Part 2
videos.description: The 13th video in our HTML5 Tutorial series. Here, I talk about how to support the most modern browsers at once with the correct video formats.

videos.title: Video Part 3
videos.description: The 14th video in our HTML5 Tutorial series. Here, I show you the video attributes in HTML5.

videos.title: Video Part 4
videos.description: The 15th video in our HTML5 Tutorial series. Here, I show you how to get video working on all browsers with a flash fallback.

videos.title: How to Play Audio with HTML5
videos.description: The 16th video in our HTML5 Tutorial series. Here, I show you the basics of HTML5 Audio, and you get to hear me sing.

videos.title: Custom Data Attributes
videos.description: The 17th video in our HTML5 Tutorial series. Here, I show you the how to use custom data attributes to add data to HTML elements.

videos.title: Using SVG
videos.description: Learn how you can start using SVG for vector graphics in your projects today!

videos.title: SVG Inline and CSS Styling
videos.description: Learn how you can have SVG code directly in your HTML document. You also learn how to style SVG with CSS.
